altTitles.en: My Ordinary Life

altTitles.ja: 日常

description.de: Währendessen der Titel "alltägliches Leben" bedeutet ist der Inhalt alles andere als alltäglich. Es handelt sich um ein komplett bizarres und verücktes "alltags Leben" von einer gruppe High School Schüler. Das Setting ist eine außergewöhnliche Schule, wo du den Rektor sehen kannst wie er mit einen Reh kämpft oder einen Roboter Arm. Wie auch immer, es gibt immernoch normale Geshichten, wie ein Kartenhaus bauen oder einen Test schreiben für den du dich nicht vorbereitet bist. Der Stil ist süß aber mischt auch extreme Ausdrücke und Actionszenen für Überraschende Komedie Einlagen.
description.en:
While the title suggests a story of simple, everyday school life, the contents are more the opposite. The setting is a strange school where you may see the principal wrestle a deer or a robot's arm hide a rollcake. However there are still normal stories, like making a card castle or taking a test you didn't study for. The art style is cute but mixes with extreme expressions and action sequences for surprising comedy bits.

(The original magazine run ends at Chapter 192)
description.ru: Обычная манга про обыную японскую жизнь.
description.pt-br: Enquanto o título sugere uma história simples de vida escolar, todos os dias, o conteúdo é mais o contrário. O cenário é uma escola estranha, onde você poderá ver o principal lutar com um cervo ou o braço de um robô esconder um bolo. No entanto ainda há histórias normais, como fazer um castelo de cartas ou de um teste que você não estudou. O estilo de arte é bonito, mas se mistura com expressões extremas e sequências de ação para os bits de comédia surpreendentes...

altTitles.ja: 幽霊と疲れた会社員

altTitles.en: The Ghost and the Exhausted Office Worker

description.en:
A story about an old ghost and the exhausted office worker he watches over as he gradually learns to find meaning in his life.

Original by [@yukiyuki_nkym](https://twitter.com/yukiyuki_nkym) on Twitter.

altTitles.en: His Majesty Is Mine

description.en:
Ga-Yeon, a woman who was getting tired of boring men, finds herself falling into the world of the Kashan Empire and becoming the concubine of Emperor Xeros. He's handsome, fit, and he even has a cute side! This is how Ga-Yeon’s story of taming the awkward emperor begins! ♥

---

[Original PV](https://youtu.be/TttzAw-4XcE)

altTitles.en: The Vigilant Lion Knight

altTitles.ja: 快傑ライオン丸

description.en: During the Warring States period, the demon king Gosun, who has been hiding in the Himalayas for a hundred years and has mastered evil sorcery, is aiming to conquer Japan. Shishimaru fights as the invincible ninja Kaikitsu Lionmaru with the sword given to him by Koji Kashin, Japan's greatest ninja!

altTitles.ja: はるかリセット

description.en: Haruka is a writer who is overwhelmed by deadlines and takes time out of her busy schedule to reset her mind. Strolling around the neighborhood, soaking in the public bath, eating the local cuisine, enjoying the park... even though she can’t take a big vacation or travel far, she’s determined to still enjoy any little “vacation” she can by getting creative!
description.ja: 締め切りに追われる作家のはるかが、忙しい毎日の合間を縫ってわずかな時間で気持ちをリセット。ご近所散策、銭湯、近場グルメ、公園満喫…まとまった休みが取れなくても、遠くへ旅行に行けなくても、少しの発想の切り替えで、ワクワクできる「休み」は満喫できる! 休みが足りないすべての人に、はるかがステキな休日を贈ります!

altTitles.ja: のあ先輩はともだち。

altTitles.en: Noa Is My Senior, and My Friend.

description.en:
A bitter and painful adult's life needs "friends".  Set in a game company, Rihito Otsuka (23), who is your everyday salaryman, and Noa Saotome (27), the ultimate career woman. Two characters whose lives aren't supposed to intersect become "friends" by chance.  A little sweet and slightly heavy office "friends" comedy begins!

---

**Links:** 
- [Alternative Raw (Ch15 Continue Here)](https://ynjn.jp/allEpisodeList/10427)
description.ja:
苦くて辛いオトナの人生にこそ、“ともだち”が必要だ。ゲーム会社を舞台に、仕事も人付き合いも“ほどほど”が身上の「平熱さとり系」大塚理人(23)と、何事にも全力すぎる「限界バリキャリ」早乙女望愛(27)。交わらないキャラのふたりが、ひょんなことから「友達」に…？　少し甘くて若干重めな「オフィス”ともだち”コメディ」スタート！

---

**Links:** 
- [Alternative Raw (Ch15 Continue Here)](https://ynjn.jp/allEpisodeList/10427)
description.ru:
«Друзья» необходимы в горькой и мучительной жизни взрослого человека.

История, происходящая в игровой компании, разворачивается вокруг Рихито Оцуки (23 года), который «умерен» в своей работе и социальных взаимодействиях, и Ноа Саотомэ (27 лет), карьеристки, которая выкладывается на полную во всём, что делает. И эти два непересекающихся характера случайно становятся «друзьями»?.. И так начинается немного сладкая и тяжеловатая «офисно-дружеская» комедия!

---

**Links:** 
- [Alternative Raw (Ch15 Continue Here)](https://ynjn.jp/allEpisodeList/10427)
description.es-la:
La vida amarga y dolorosa de los adultos necesita amistades. Ambientado en una compañía de videojuegos, Rihito Otsuka, un oficinista de 23 años. Que es normal socializando y trabajando. Y Noa Saotome de 27, que lo da todo en todo lo que hace. Dos personaje que a priori no encajan... ¿Pueden ser amigos por casualidad? 
¡Comienza una dulce y pequeña pero pesada comedia sobre amigos de oficina!

title.en: Class de 2 Banme ni Kawaii Onna no Ko to Tomodachi ni Natta

altTitles.ja: クラスで２番目に可愛い女の子と友だちになった

altTitles.en: I Became Friends with the Second Cutest Girl in My Class

altTitles.ja-ro: Class de 2 Banme ni Kawaii Onna no Ko to Tomodachi ni Natta

altTitles.id: Aku Berteman dengan Gadis Paling Cantik Kedua di Kelas ku

altTitles.it: Sono diventato amico con la seconda ragazza più carina nella mia classe

description.en:
I, Maehara Maki, someone who couldn’t make any acquaintances or friends in high school, finally had someone I can hang out with outside of school. A girl.

Her name was Asanagi-san. The boys in my class called her ‘The class’ second cutest girl’ behind her back.

On Fridays, she would refuse her best friend, Amami, ‘the cutest girl in class’ invitation just to hang out in my house with me.

Together, we played games, watched some movies, read some manga while eating junk foods like pizza and hamburgers, and chugging cola without a care in the world. To others, we may seem sloppy, but it was a precious, secret time together for Asanagi-san and myself.
description.id:
Aku, Maehara Maki, seseorang yang tidak memiliki kenalan atau teman di SMA, akhirnya memiliki seseorang yang bisa aku ajak bergaul di luar sekolah. Seorang gadis.

Namanya Asanagi-san. Anak-anak laki-laki di kelas saya memanggilnya 'Gadis paling imut kedua di kelas' di belakangnya.

Pada hari Jumat, dia akan menolak ajakan sahabatnya, Amami, 'gadis paling manis di kelas' hanya untuk berkumpul di rumah ku dengan ku.

Bersama-sama, kami bermain game, menonton film, membaca manga sambil makan junk food seperti pizza dan hamburger, dan menenggak cola tanpa peduli dengan dunia. Bagi orang lain, kami mungkin terlihat ceroboh, tetapi itu adalah waktu yang berharga, waktu rahasia bersama untuk Asanagi-san dan ku sendiri.
description.es-la: Yo, Maehara Maki, alguien que no podía conocer ni hacer amigos en la escuela secundaria, finalmente tenía a alguien con quien podía pasar el rato fuera de la escuela. Una mujer. Su nombre era Asanagi-san. Los chicos de mi clase la llamaban "La segunda chica más linda de la clase'" a sus espaldas. Los viernes, rechazaba la invitación de su mejor amiga, Amami, "la chica más linda de la clase" solo para pasar el rato en mi casa conmigo. Juntos, jugamos, vimos algunas películas, leímos manga mientras comíamos comida chatarra como pizza y hamburguesas, y tomábamos refrescos de cola sin preocuparnos por nada. Para otros, podemos parecer descuidados, pero fue un tiempo secreto y precioso para Asanagi-san y para mí.
description.pt-br:
Eu, Maehara Maki, alguém que não conseguia conhecer ou fazer amigos no ensino médio, finalmente consegui alguém com quem eu pudesse sair fora da escola. Uma garota.

O nome dela era Asanagi-san. Os meninos da minha turma a chamavam de 'a segunda garota mais fofa da turma' pelas costas.

Às sextas-feiras, ela recusava o convite de sua melhor amiga, Amami, 'a garota mais fofa da classe' só para ficar na minha casa comigo.

Juntos, jogamos, assistimos a alguns filmes, lemos alguns mangás enquanto comíamos junk food como pizza e hambúrgueres e bebíamos refrigerantes sem nenhuma preocupação no mundo. Para outros, podemos parecer desleixados, mas foi um tempo precioso e secreto juntos para Asanagi-san e eu.

altTitles.en: Doomsday for All: Me, Virus Monarch

description.en: The world is plunged into doomsday. The entire doomsday world has turned into a cruel evolutionary game! This is the greatest opportunity and trial ground for mankind, and it is also the amusement park of gods and demons! Chen Bai was reborn and returned
description.zh: 全球陷入末日笼罩。 整个末日世界，变成了一场残酷的进化游戏！ 这是人类最大的机缘与试炼场，也是神魔的游乐园！ 陈白重生回到了末日开始的十天前！ 直接注射丧尸病毒， 觉醒SSS天赋：病毒君王！ 掌控病毒开始一条与众不同的进化之路！

altTitles.ja: 高飛車ドレイちゃん

description.en: At the market, a man stumbles upon a particularly arrogant slave...

title.en: One Day a Message Window Appeared Out of Nowhere!?

altTitles.ja: ある日突然メッセージウィンドウが表示されたんですけど！？

altTitles.ja-ro: Aru Hi Totsuzen Message Window ga Hyoujisaretan desu kedo!?
Aru Hi Totsuzen Messeeji Windou ga Hyoujisaretandesukedo!?

description.en:
The protagonist, a university student named Kazuya Hayakawa woke up one day with a message window that shows up in his field of view. This window is always visible to him, and when certain lines are displayed in it, he gets thrown into confusion.

From that day onward began Hayakawa's daily ordeal of getting manipulated by this message window.

(Source: Amazon JP)
description.ja:
主人公・早川一哉はある日目が覚めるとメッセージウィンドウが見えるようになってしまった。
常に表示されるそのウィンドウにはとあるセリフが表示され主人公を混乱させる。

この日から早川一哉のメッセージウィンドウに振り回される苦難の日々が始まった。

altTitles.ja: スイカ

description.ja: 怪奇現象や幽霊の目撃情報が絶えない呪われし丑光高等学校。この学校に赴任してきた教師・園 渚のクラスには丑光高校に伝わる百七不思議のひとつ、物部スイカという小学生（？）が居座っていた。オカルト的な噂を一切信じない園だったが、スイカに気に入られたことで不可解で笑えるトラブルに巻き込まれていく!!

altTitles.ja: 弟の夫

description.en:
Ten years ago Yaichi's twin brother moved to Canada and married a man called Mike. A month ago, he died.  
  
Now Mike has arrived in Japan to meet Yaichi and his daughter Kana. Yaichi has to face his own preconceptions and come to terms with who his brother really was.  
  
[Official English](https://www.penguinrandomhouse.com/books/545416/my-brothers-husband-volumes-1-and-2-by-gengoroh-tagame/)

Adapted to [Live Action](https://www.cinra.net/article/column-201803-otoutonootto) in 2018.

---
- **Won the 19th Japan Media Arts Festival Division Excellence Award in 2015**
- **Won the 47th Japan Cartoonists Association Excellence Award in 2018**
description.uk:
Звичайнісінький день Яїчі Оріґучі перериває кремезний іноземець, який з'являється перед дверима і обіймає його. Чоловік представляється Майком Фленаґаном, і Яїчі швидко дізнається, що Майк — вдівець Рьоджі, його молодшого брата-близнюка. Відтоді як Рьоджі виїхав до Канади десять років тому Яїчі не чув про нього нічого, окрім того, що він одружився з іноземцем і помер місяць тому.

У той час як Яїчі занепокоєний, його маленька донька Кана в захваті від ідеї мати дядька-ґея з Канади. Нерозуміння Каною поглядів японського суспільства на гомосексуальність змушує Яїчі замислитися над власними упередженими уявленнями. І поки Майк продовжує жити в родині, Яїчі поступово дізнається більше про свого зятя і згадує своє минуле з Рьоджі.
description.pt-br: Há dez anos, o irmão gêmeo de Yaichi acabou se mudando para o Canadá. Como os dois não conversavam tanto, a viagem ao exterior só ajudou a aumentar a distância entre eles. Um mês atrás, Yaichi recebeu a notícia do falecimento de seu irmão e, pouco tempo depois, ele recebe a visita de Mike, seu cunhado. Ele viajou ao Japão para conhecer a família e os lugares de que o seu falecido marido tanto falava. Embora relutante, a família o recebe e Yaichi não só confronta os seus preconceitos com relação à homossexualidade, como também conhece um outro lado do seu irmão e passa a acompanhar como a próxima geração pode lidar com tais questões.

title.en: The Shikisaki Sisters Want to Be Exposed

altTitles.ja: 四季崎姉妹はあばかれたい

description.en: One day, Tarou Yamada, who runs a detective business, slips on a banana peel and reincarnates into Tsukushi Shikisaki, the younger brother of three beautiful big-breasted sisters who will all die on the same day. As he spends time surrounded by the three beautiful sisters, he finds out that the boy he is reincarnated as will be killed by one of the three sisters ...!?
description.ja: 探偵業を営む山田太郎はある日、バナナの皮に足を滑らせてしまい、同日に命を落とした美麗三姉妹の弟・四季崎つくしに転生をしてしまう。美人三姉妹に囲まれて過ごすことになるが、四季崎つくしが三姉妹の誰かに殺されたことに気がついてしまい…!?

altTitles.ja: 巨人の星

description.en:
**"Hyuma, be a big giant star!"**

This is the story of Hyuma Hoshi , a hot-blooded boy who endures intense, bloody training in response to his father's wish!

Adapted into Anime twice once in 1968, lasting 182 episodes and again in 1977(As Shin Star of the Giants with a follow-up), lasting a total of 75 episodes. Numerous Anime films were also produced as well as an OVA featuring a crossover with Tezuka's Atom, directed by Gundam's Yoshiyuki Tomino.

---
- **Won the 8th Kodansha Children's Manga Award in 1967**

altTitles.ja: メリーさん

altTitles.en: Merry-san

description.en:
Mary-san who calls you on the phone, telling you she's nearby...nothing but a prank call, right? Witness the cute and charming life she lives!

This is based on the Japanese urban legend Mary-san.  If it makes no sense at all to you, see https://www.kowabana.net/2018/06/09/mary-san/ and it will be a lot more comprehensible, while still being cute.

title.en: It's Not Easy to Be a Man After Traveling to the Future

altTitles.zh: 穿越未来之男人不好当

altTitles.zh-ro: Chuanyue Weilai Zhi Nanren Buhao Dang

altTitles.ru: Нелегко быть мужчиной после путешествия в будущее

description.en:
After dying from a strange terminal illness, Ling Lan was reborn into a world 10,000 years into the future. Although she dearly wished she could just live a peaceful and uneventful life in her new healthy body, fate had other plans…  
  
Forced to disguise herself as a boy just so she could inherit her deceased father’s premium military benefits, Ling Lan’s journey to adulthood was full of challenges. After much difficulty, she finally turned sixteen when she could drop the charade. But before she could grasp her newfound freedom to get married and start her own family, a twist of fate results in her being thrown into the Federation’s top military boys’ school.  
  
With these twists of fate, Ling Lan had little choice but to walk further and further down a path of no return, one of cold and aloof dominance… (NovelUpdates)

Suho, an all-round part-timer, was willing to do anything for money.  He was startled and ran away after accidentally witnessing his college sunbae Kanghyuk engaged in an S&M play at a motel during a routine pizza delivery.

Kanghyuk later visits the stunned Suho and makes an offer for a part-time role as his acting lover, which Suho finds impossible to refuse...
“Suho-ya, the boyfriend part-time job I asked of you also includes 'that kind of thing'.”

"I have to protect you. That's what I thought. At first......"

Keyoo, who took time off school and was looking for a part-time job, happens upon an announcement for a high-paying part-time job at a PC room.

When he arrives at the PC room for his interview, he sees crowds of people waiting outside as if it were a famous restaurant.

The reason being: the "boss's face".

A pure and beautiful boss who looks clueless and naïve, like he'd be an easy target of deception. Nervously standing teary-eyed within the wolfpack of onlookers. All eyes are on him...

Keyoo, who dreams of being a righteous policeman in the future, makes up his mind from the very first moment to protect the boss from this wolfpack.

But... as time goes on, he discovers that the boss's true nature doesn’t match that innocent and clueless outer image...

"Excuse me, Boss... why are you beating up gangsters...?!"

altTitles.ja: お前なんか拾わなければよかった

altTitles.en: I Shouldn't Have Rescued You

description.en: Matsu, a beautiful girl who gets weaker every day, and Kotake, a beautiful woman who takes care of her with great affection. What are the true identities of these two...?

altTitles.ja: 異世界もふもふカフェ

altTitles.en: Other World Fluffy Cafe

description.en: Taichi Arima is overworked at his day job. One day, going home late due to working overtime, he saves a fluffy white cat from being run over. He gains a special "Tame" ability and is transported to another world. With such a strange ability, what will he do... Why, open a Fluffy Cafe, of course!

title.en: Sacchan to Ken-chan wa Kyou mo Itteru

altTitles.en: Sacchan and Ken-chan Are Going at it Again

altTitles.ja: さっちゃんとけんちゃんは今日もイってる

description.en: University student Kenta is excited to be going out with the quiet but beautiful Sachiko. Six months into their relationship, a side of Sachiko other than her "ladylike" side becomes apparent. The more you know about her, the more you fall in love with her.
description.ja: 物静かな美人・幸子と付き合うことになり、舞い上がる男子大学生・賢太。 付き合って半年後、明らかになる”おしとやか”だけじゃない彼女の一面に!? 知れば知るほど好きになる、イケメン彼女と乙女な彼氏のイってる系エロコメディ開幕!!

title.en: How the Little Brother Who Turned Into a Girl Became His Big Brother's Girlfriend

altTitles.ja: 兄貴の彼女になる、女の子になっちゃった弟。

altTitles.ja-ro: Aniki No Kanojo Ni Naru, Onnanoko Ni Nacchatta Otouto

altTitles.en: When I Returned Home for the First Time in a Long Time, My Brother Transformed Into a Girl

altTitles.ja: 久しぶりに実家に帰ったら弟がTSしてた。

altTitles.ja-ro: Hisashiburi Ni Jikka Ni Kaettara Otouto Ga TS Shiteta

description.en:
When I returned home for the first time in a long time, my little brother transformed into a girl!?

---

[Fantia 18+ Content](https://mangadex.org/title/7a23de9c-01b8-43bd-ac38-0bfe0bebcc3b)
description.id: Ketika aku pulang ke rumah setelah sekian lamanya adik tiri laki-laki ku berubah menjadi gadis!?

description.en:
I had a one-night stand with my boss?!
Jian Yoo is an editor at a fashion magazine. She frantically ran to Paris after hearing that her boyfriend is two-timing.
Not knowing better, she made a rash decision to sleep with a stranger she had just met there…
Three months later, the editor-in-chief of Jian’s company flew in from their headquarters in France. However, that man…. turned out to be the one Jian spent the night with!!
description.ko:
하룻밤을 같이 보낸 그 남자가 내 상사라고?!
패션지 의 에디터 유지안. 그녀는 약혼자의 양다리 소식에 무작정 파리로 떠난다.
그곳에서 우연히 만난 남자와 충동적으로 하룻밤을 보내 버리고…
3개월의 시간이 흐른 후, 지안의 회사에 만렙의 편집장이 프랑스에서 오게 된다. 그런데 그 남자… 바로 지안과 하룻밤을 보낸 프랑스에서의 그 남자다!!
description.vi: Tôi đã có tình một đêm với sếp của mình ?! Jian Yoo là biên tập viên của một tạp chí thời trang. Cô rất hay chạy đến Paris sau khi nghe tin bạn trai của mình ngoại tình. Không biết làm gì hơn, cô ấy đã quyết định ngủ với một người lạ mà cô ấy mới gặp ở đó…Ba tháng sau, tổng biên tập của công ty mà Jian làm việc bay đến từ trụ sở chính của họ ở Pháp. Tuy nhiên, người đàn ông đó…. hóa ra là người mà Jian đã qua đêm cùng!!

altTitles.ja: 無限のスキルゲッター！

altTitles.en: Infinite Skill Getter!

description.en:
During a Once-in-A-lifetime ceremony, the young boy, Yuri, receives the trash skill “Life transfer”, allowing him to transfer his life force to another person…
Crushed by despair after receiving the skill, Yuri encounters a woman who loses her life right in front of him. Wanting to be the one to decide who he gives his life to, he activates “Life Transfer”, dying on the spot. It had appeared as though the woman’s life was ended rather abruptly, however, the woman turned out to be the daughter of god. As a “thank you” for saving the life of his daughter, god resurrected Yuri, and in addition, gave him the ability to receive double the experience points each month.
With the endless amount of experience he gains, Yuri will leisurely walk the path to the world’s strongest, collecting endless amounts of skills along the way!
***
[Orignal webnovel](https://www.alphapolis.co.jp/novel/587737999/279349914)

altTitles.ja: ガンニバル

description.en: When a police officer is posted to a remote village in the countryside, little does he realize he's encroaching on a community of cannibals…
description.ru:
Полицейский Дайго Агава вместе с семьёй переезжает в горную деревушку под названием Цветочная. Жители деревни горячо принимают семью Дайго.
Однажды в лесу находят труп старушки. После этого происшествия Дайго постепенно начинает осознавать все происходящие вокруг странности и приходит к мысли, что в этой деревне едят людей. Начинают происходить очень странные инциденты, атмосфера отчуждения наполняет деревню. Сможет ли обычный полицейский разгадать все ужасные тайны, которая таит в себе эта деревня и, что важнее, сможет ли он остаться в живых?

altTitles.en: Dafeng's Night Squad

description.en:
In this world, there is: Confucianism; Taoism; Buddhism, Demons, and Magicians. Xu Qi’an, a graduate from the police academy, suddenly finds himself waking up in prison, to be exiled to the border three days later …

His initial goal was to protect himself in this world with no laws, and to be able to live a leisurely life as a rich man..

Many years later, Xu Qi’an looks back on the past, and the long-dead enemies and friends, as well as the numerous bones he has left behind.

As the Yangtze River flows eastward, the waves wash away the heroes; right and wrong, success or failure will all turn into nothing but history. However, just like the sun’s rays gleaming over the towering mountains, after the sunset, a new sun will rise.

altTitles.en: Umamusume Cinderella Gray

altTitles.ja: ウマ娘シンデレラグレイ

description.en: Uma Musume: Cinderella Gray is a spin-off title of the Uma Musume project by Cygames. It follows Oguri Cap through her time at Kasamatsu Training Center Academy and on her journey of becoming a legendary horse girl.
description.ja: 寂れたカサマツの地に現れた、ひとりの灰被りの少女。後に“怪物”と呼ばれるその少女は、どこを目指して疾るのか――。地方から中央の伝説へ。
description.vi: Uma Musume: Cinderella Gray là một manga spin-off của series Uma Musume. Câu chuyện kể về Oguri Cap và cuộc hành trình trở thành một Mã Nương huyền thoại của cô.

title.en: The Terminally Ill Young Master of the Baek Clan

altTitles.en: Baek Clan's Terminally Ill Young Master

description.en: Baek Yigang is a son of the Baek Clan, one of the seven great clans of Zhongyuan. Afflicted with the Taiyin Qi Blockage, he is cursed with a shortened lifespan and the inability to collect internal energy. He had been peacefully spending the rest of his days indoors when he was ambushed by a group of masked people. During the ambush, he lost his servant who was like a sister to him. Chased by the attackers, Baek Yigang escaped through a secret underground path. When he came across a blocked path, he decided he’d at least die fighting and picked up a rusted sword that was stuck in the ground…

altTitles.en: Youngest Son of the Renowned Swordsmanship Clan
The Youngest Son of a Renowned Family of Swordsmen
Youngest Son of the Renowned Swordsmanship Clan
Swordmaster's Youngest Son

description.en:
Jin Runcandel was destined to become the head of his swordmaster clan. But despite his best efforts, he's banished for his shoddy swordsmanship. Though Jin eventually makes a contract with the god Solderet and is freed from the curse that hindered his abilities, he meets a rather unfortunate end. In the next moment, however, he awakens as a baby, long before his tragedy began.

Armed with a second chance and some new powers, Jin swears to fulfill his destiny and become the ultimate swordmaster!

---

- [Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UspJjUOFrFQ)
description.ko:
진 룬칸델
대륙 최고의 검술명가, 룬칸델의 막내아들
룬칸델 역사상 최악의 둔재

비참하게 쫓겨나 허무한 최후를 맞이한 그에게
다시 한 번 기회가 주어졌다.

“너는 이 힘을 어떻게 사용하고 싶더냐?”
“저를 위해 사용하고 싶습니다.”

전생의 기억과 압도적인 재능, 그리고 신과의 계약

최강이 될 준비는 끝났다.

---

- [Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UspJjUOFrFQ)

altTitles.ja: 佐々木と宮野

description.en: It all started like a typical old-school boys’ love plotline—bad-boy senior meets adorably awkward underclassman, one of them falls in love, and so on and so forth. But although Miyano is a self-proclaimed boys’ love expert, he hasn’t quite realized…he’s in one himself. Which means it’s up to Sasaki to make sure their story has a happily ever after…!

title.en: I Became the Tyrant of a Defense Game

altTitles.en: Tyrant of the Tower Defense Game

altTitles.zh: 成为塔防游戏里的暴君

altTitles.th: ผู้พิชิตเกมป้องกันฐาน

description.en:
Protect the Empire was considered unbeatable for over a decade until streamer extraordinaire Mr. Gamer Geek comes along and defeats the game on its hardest mode. But just when he's about to rest on his laurels, he's sucked into the world of the game by some mysterious figure and thrust into Prince Ash's body!

Ash now realizes that every click and command he had mindlessly sent out had real, gruesome costs - including his teammates' lives that he sacrificed for the sake of victory. To make up for his previous actions, Ash promises to keep his whole team alive this time while using his wits and knowledge to survive the hellish onslaught of monsters. 

But who brought him to this world in the first place, and why?

Ash may soon find the answers to these questions - if he can survive the bloody battlefield first!
description.fr:
Ash était un streamer de jeux vidéo, surnommé "otaku classique".

Une fois qu'il a réussi à terminer un des jeux classiques les plus compliqués, "Protégez l'Empire", il a été aspiré dans le monde du jeu et s'est réincarné en tant que prince héritier, complètement psychopathe. Dans le jeu d'origine, il était connu comme le pire commandant qui a causé la quasi-destruction des forces armées de la ville, et qui a rencontré une fin tragique.

Cependant, Ash est déterminé à survivre en tant que commandant ''invincible''.
description.ko:
타워디펜스&던전오펜스 RPG <제국을 지켜라>
누구도 클리어하지 못한 난이도로 게임의 엔딩을 봤다.
그런데 정신을 차리니 게임 속이다.
그것도 공략이 불가능한 튜토리얼 스테이지다.
"반드시 클리어해 주마, 이 거지 같은 게임……!"
description.th: <ปกป้องอาณาจักร> เกม RPG แนวป้องกันฐานและตะลุยดันเจี้ยน เกมที่ยากจนไม่มีใครเอาชนะมันได้ แต่ฉันทำได้จนได้เห็นตอนจบ ทว่าพอตั้งสติได้ก็กลับกลายเป็นว่าฉันได้เข้ามาอยู่ในเกมแล้ว แถมยังเป็นด่านปฐมบทที่ไม่มีทางเอาชนะได้อีกต่างหาก “ฉันจะเอาชนะมันให้ได้ ไอ้เกมเสงเครงนี่น่ะ.......!”
description.zh:
重生塔防游戏里的配角，通关地狱级难度的关卡！

无人能通关的地狱级难度塔防游戏“守护帝国”。当首次通关后发现自己居然在游戏里面，还处在不可能成功突破的新手教程剧情里？！

能否再一次成功攻略地狱级难度的游戏？

altTitles.ja: Amano Megumi ha Sukidarake!

altTitles.en: Amano Megumi is Full of Gaps!
Amano Megumi is FULL of Openings!
Amano Megumi is Wide Open!

altTitles.th: เรื่องหนักอกของอามาโนะ เมกุมิ!

altTitles.ja: 天野めぐみはスキだらけ!

description.en: Shindo Manabu is a student at a very prestigious high school whose goal is to get into Tokyo University. He studies constantly and tries to never lose sight of that goal. That is until his childhood friend, Amano Megumi, who goes to the same school starts to distract him. He originally only remembered her as the tomboy she was as a kid, until he notices how "developed" she has become. As these two get closer to each other, hilarity often ensues and subsequently, Manabu becomes more and more distracted from his goal of getting into Tokyo U.
description.pt-br: Shindo Manabu é um estudante de uma escola de ensino médio muito prestigiada cujo objetivo é entrar na Universidade de Tóquio. Ele estuda constantemente e tenta nunca perder de vista este objetivo. Isso até que sua amiga de infância, Amano Megumi, que frequenta a mesma escola, começa a distraí-lo. Ele originalmente só se lembrava dela como a moleca que ela era quando criança, até perceber o quão “desenvolvida” ela se tornou. À medida que esses dois se aproximam, a hilaridade geralmente acontece e, posteriormente, Manabu se torna cada vez mais distraído de seu objetivo de entrar na Universidade de Tóquio.

title.en: The Reborn Young Lord Is an Assassin

altTitles.en: The Regressed Son of a Duke is an Assassin
The Regressed Youngest Son of the Duke Is an Assassin

description.en:
Cyan Vert, illegitimate son of the Duke and the empire's greatest assassin, is betrayed by the righteous brother whose shadow he's always lived in. But just before the fatal blow strikes his throat, Cyan awakes to find he's just a boy again. The young lord has been reborn, and this time, he's not going to live in anyone's shadow!

(Source: WEBTOON)

title.en: Ie ga Moete Jinsei Dou Demo Yoku Natta kara, Nokotta Nakenashi no Kin de Dark Elf no Dorei o Katta.

altTitles.ja-ro: Ie ga Moete Jinsei Dō Demo Yoku Nattakara, Nokotta Nakenashi no Kin de Dark Elf no Dorei o Katta.

altTitles.en: Since I Didn't Have Anything Left to Lose in Life After My House Burned Down, I Bought a Dark Elf Slave With the Remains of My Meager Savings.

altTitles.ja: 家が燃えて人生どうでも良くなったから、残ったなけなしの金でダークエルフの奴隷を買った。

altTitles.zh-hk: 家被燒掉的我買了個奴隸

altTitles.zh: 家被烧掉的我买了个奴隶

altTitles.ko: 집이 불타서 인생이 아무래도 좋아졌기 때문에, 얼마 안 되는 남은 돈으로 다크 엘프의 노예를 샀다.

description.en:
He lost his new home and all his property, but found a cute girl!  
   
Harold, a poor laborer who saved for years, finally obtained the house of his dreams, only to lose it to a fire the very same day. Feeling like nothing mattered anymore, Harold finds himself at an auction, where he ends up spending all of his savings on a slave, Atie…  
  
Harold, with his secret technique, and Atie, with her skills as an adventurer, begin their freewheeling journey now!  
Drawn by hentai artist.
  
[Webnovel link](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n0884fk/)
description.ja: 貯金に貯金を重ね念願のマイホームを手に入れたが、即日火事で失った貧乏労働者・ハロルド。すべてがどうでもよくなったハロルドは、偶然立ち寄った競売で貯金全てを使い、奴隷・アティを買ってしまうのだが…。秘密の技を持つハロルドと冒険者スキルを持つアティの気ままな旅が今、始まる！

altTitles.en: Solo Necromancy
The Only Necromancer

description.en:
Seongwu is a former special forces soldier who has returned to college after completing his national service. His ordinary life as a student is shattered during class one day when he and his fellow students are faced with a mysterious prompt asking them to “select a role.”

Seongwu chooses the necromancer, a rare ability that grants him the power to control the undead.

With the campus and outside world seemingly on the brink of collapse, Seongwu must use his newfound powers to battle fearsome monsters and help save his fellow students. But will they make it out alive?

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/silingfashiwanglingzhipeizhe/list?title_no=1981)

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/fantasy/lone-necromancer/list?title_no=3619)

- [Official French Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/fr/fantasy/the-lone-necromancer/list?title_no=4063)
description.fr:
"Quel est le métier le plus utile pour survivre dans un monde en ruine ?". Cette question apparaît devant Seong-woo alors qu'il somnole en cours. Lui et les autres étudiants ont 15 secondes pour choisir une carte parmi celles qui sont apparues devant eux. Celle choisie déterminera leurs pouvoirs qui leur permettront de survivre dans un monde chaotique, qui ressemble fortement à un jeu vidéo. Pour sa part, Seong-woo sera un nécromancien !

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/silingfashiwanglingzhipeizhe/list?title_no=1981)

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/fantasy/lone-necromancer/list?title_no=3619)

- [Official French Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/fr/fantasy/the-lone-necromancer/list?title_no=4063)
description.id:
Pekerjaan apa yang akan kau pilih untuk bertahan hidup saat dunia hancur oleh monster-monster yang tiba-tiba bermunculan?! Setelah memilih 'Necromancer' sebagai pekerjaannnya, Sungwoo dapat menjadikan monster yang telah ia kalahkan menjadi pengikutnya!

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/silingfashiwanglingzhipeizhe/list?title_no=1981)

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/fantasy/lone-necromancer/list?title_no=3619)

- [Official French Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/fr/fantasy/the-lone-necromancer/list?title_no=4063)
description.ko:
곧 세상이 멸망한다.
전설 속에나 나올 법한 몬스터들이 각지에 출현한다.
그리고 사람들을 잡아먹고, 길거리를 점령하며, 빌딩과 지하철에 던전을 만들기 시작한다.

멸망한 세계에서 살아남기 위해 단 한 가지 직업을 고를 수 있다.
당신은 무슨 직업을 고르겠는가?
"네크로맨서"

나에게는 멸망이 무대이고, 죽음이 자산이 된다.

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/silingfashiwanglingzhipeizhe/list?title_no=1981)

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/fantasy/lone-necromancer/list?title_no=3619)

- [Official French Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/fr/fantasy/the-lone-necromancer/list?title_no=4063)
description.ru:
Мир на грани разрушения. Существа, упоминания о которых встречались лишь в мифах и легендах, теперь заполоняют города, обживаются под людскими жилищами и в метро, пожирая всё живое.
А что до человечества… Ему будет предложено занять новую роль в нынешнем мире выживания.
Сонву выбрал класс «некромант», и теперь трупы, что обагряют Землю, ему только на руку.

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/silingfashiwanglingzhipeizhe/list?title_no=1981)

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/fantasy/lone-necromancer/list?title_no=3619)

- [Official French Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/fr/fantasy/the-lone-necromancer/list?title_no=4063)
description.zh:
魔物侵袭，世界灭亡在即！
退役特种兵的降维打击！
某一天，只存在于传说中的魔物们突然出现，肆意地破坏街道、撕咬人类，并且在高楼和地铁建立起了自己的巢穴…如果在灭亡的世界，能够选择一个职业，你会选择哪种职业呢？对于身为“死灵法师”的刘成宇来说，灭亡即是舞台，丧生即为资产。

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/silingfashiwanglingzhipeizhe/list?title_no=1981)

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/fantasy/lone-necromancer/list?title_no=3619)

- [Official French Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/fr/fantasy/the-lone-necromancer/list?title_no=4063)

title.en: S Rank Boukensha de aru Ore no Musume-tachi wa Juudo no Father Con deshita

altTitles.en: My Daughters, S-Rank Adventurers, Have a Severe Obsession With Their Father

altTitles.ja: Sランク冒険者である俺の娘たちは重度のファザコンでした

altTitles.ru: Мои дочери, которые являются искателями приключений S-ранга, очень сильно увлеклись

altTitles.zh: 身为S级冒险者的我，女儿却是重度父控

description.en: The youngest A-rank adventurer, child prodigy Kaiser, finds three babies who were the only survivor of a destroyed village. Then he decided to give up his job as an adventurer and raise them. Over time, the girls grow brightly and show exceptional talents in fencing, magic and management. However, these girls also seem to love their father, Kaiser!
description.ja:
将来を嘱望されていた最年少のＡランク冒険者カイゼルは自分のミスで守るべき村をドラゴンに焼き尽くされてしまう……。絶望の淵に立たされた彼が、焼け野原で見つけたのが村の唯一の生き残りである――３人の赤ん坊だった。希望の光に満ちた赤ん坊を胸に、カイゼルは誓う。

「この子たちは、俺が立派に育て幸せにしてみせる！」

時は経ち、娘たちは彼の尽力の甲斐もあり立派に成長を遂げ、剣技に、経営に、魔法に、稀有な才能を花開かせようとしていた。

だけど、困ったことが1つだけ……。
優秀過ぎる娘たちが父・カイゼルを大好き過ぎて――!?

title.en: One Step Closer to the Demon King

altTitles.en: One Step to the Devil

altTitles.ja: 魔王まであと一歩

altTitles.id: Aku Raja Lautan tapi jadi Gembel

altTitles.en: Even the Demon King, One Step at a Time
One Step to Being Dark Lord
One Step to the Demon King
One Step for the Dark Lord

description.en:
This is no different from ordinary villager life...
"There can be no one stronger than me in this world!"
To become the strongest, Yuria, the Sea Queen, went ashore in search of the Demon King. But when she looked at her reflection, she saw the face of a child. In exchange for her legs, she lost all her strength... Even so, still striving to become the strongest, Yuria begins a painful journey!

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/FANTASY/jumowangyibuzhiyao/list?title_no=1875)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001522)
description.id:
[ "Hanya saja... aku jadi tidak ada bedanya dengan penduduk desa..." ] "Tidak boleh ada makhluk yang lebih kuat dariku di dunia ini!" Untuk menjadi yang terkuat, Yuria, Raja Lautan, datang ke daratan untuk mencari Raja Iblis terkuat. Namun, saat melihat ke cermin, dia melihat wajah anak kecil...? Sebagai ganti kaki, dia telah kehilangan seluruh kekuatannya. Meskipun begitu, ia masih mengincar posisi teratas di dunia! Perjalanannya yang penuh air mata dimulai!

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/FANTASY/jumowangyibuzhiyao/list?title_no=1875)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001522)
description.ko:
["이건 그냥… 마을 사람 A랑 다를게 없잖아…"]

"나보다 강한 존재는 이 세계에 있을 수 없어!"
세계관 최강자 자리를 위해 지상최강 "마왕"을 찾아
뭍으로 나온 바다의 왕 "유리아" 

그런데… 거울을 보니 웬 어린아이가…?
다리를 얻음과 동시에 
그녀의 모든 힘이 사라져 버렸다...

그럼에도 여전히 세계최강 자리를 노리고 있는
 그녀의 눈물겨운 여정이 시작된다!!

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/FANTASY/jumowangyibuzhiyao/list?title_no=1875)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001522)
description.ru:
Это… Ничем не отличается от деревенской жизни... В этом мире не может быть существа сильнее меня!” Чтобы стать сильнейшей, Юрия, Морская Королева, вышла на сушу в поисках Короля Демонов. Но… Посмотрев на свое отражение, она увидела лицо ребенка... В обмен на ноги она потеряла все свои силы... Даже так, все еще стремясь стать сильнейшей, начинается мучительное путешествие Юрии!

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/FANTASY/jumowangyibuzhiyao/list?title_no=1875)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001522)
description.zh:
深海女王无奈变成小孩？
落魄海王的陆地称霸之旅！
大海之王友丽亚为了称霸天下，特地上岸来到陆地上寻找魔王一决胜负。可上岸后才发现，自己失去了所有的力量，而且还变成了小孩子？为了称霸天下，友丽亚辛酸的崭新旅程就此拉开帷幕！

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/FANTASY/jumowangyibuzhiyao/list?title_no=1875)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001522)

title.en: Rabukome Manga ni Haitte Shimatta no de, Oshi no Make Heroine wo Zenryoku de Shiawase ni suru

altTitles.ja: ラブコメ漫画に入ってしまったので、推しの負けヒロインを全力で幸せにする

altTitles.id: Karena aku sudah masuk ke kedalam dunia manga romcom, aku akan melakukan yang terbaik untuk membuat Heroine yang kalah dapat bahagia.

altTitles.en: Since I’ve Entered the World of Romantic Comedy Manga, I’ll Do My Best to Make the Losing Heroine Happy

description.en:
In the world of a popular rom-com manga, my only mission as the friend of the MC is to make the losing heroine, Sei-chan, happy!

"I'll definitely make you happy. Please go out with me."

"W-Wait, what!? Y-You're being serious...!?"

The manga adaptation of the sweet rom-com from Kakuyomu starts now!
description.id: Seorang anak sma otaku mempunyai waifu yang kalah war, setelah pulang kerja part time ia pun membeli kebutuhan otakunya lalu dia di tabrak oleh truck-kun yang supirnya lagi turu dan malah reinkarnasi kedalam manga kesukaannya namun setelah sampai disana dia malah nembak waifunya sendiri!!?
description.ja: 大人気ラブコメ漫画の世界で、主人公の友人キャラになってしまった俺の使命はただ一つ。 劇中の負けヒロイン・聖ちゃんを幸せにしてあげることだけだ！ 「絶対に幸せにするから、俺と付き合ってほしい」 「ちょ、ちょっと待て!? お、お前、本気か…!?」 カクヨム発・話題のベタ甘ラブコメが、コミカライズで開幕!!
description.vi:
Tôi rất thích một bộ manga romcom.

Tuy nhiên, nhân vật mà tôi thích lại là một nữ phụ, một nhân vật không bao giờ có thể đến được với... nam chính.

Một ngày nọ, tôi bị tông bởi một chiếc xe tải và khi tỉnh dậy thì nhận ra mình đang vào vai người bạn thân của nam chính trong bộ manga romcom đó.

Như vậy, vai trò của tôi lúc này chỉ có một

"Tớ thích cậu, chắc chắn tớ sẽ khiến cho cậu hạnh phúc, Sei-chan!"

Chắc chắn, tôi sẽ thay đổi câu chuyện tình buồn của nữ phụ, và khiến cho cô ấy hạnh phúc!

altTitles.en: Rogue of Doom

description.en: A storm of the universe brought species mutations. The poison, undead, giants and monsters in the city roared as they waved their weapons. As the beasts in the woods fought over territorial rights, humans, too, awakened an ability known as star power… Zhou Zheng, without star power, traversed to this apocalyptic world. Using the abilities of the thief character in the game, he destroys the darkness and fog, seeking supreme power!
description.fr:
Un mouvement dans l'univers a apporté des mutations au niveau des espèces vivantes. Un poison, des morts vivants, des géants et des monstres rugissent dans la ville en agitant leurs armes. Alors que des bêtes dans les bois se battent pour des territoires, certains humains éveillent une capacité spéciale connue sous le nom de pouvoir des étoiles... Zhou Zheng, déficient de ce pouvoir, va traverser ce nouveau monde post apocalyptique.
Utilisant ses capacités de voleur issue d'un autre jeu, il détruit ténèbres et brouillard, à la recherche du pouvoir suprême !
description.zh: 一场宇宙风暴带来了物种的变异。城市中的毒尸巨怪，挥动着战斧咆哮。丛林中的异兽们，争夺着领地的主权。人类也觉醒了一种名为星力的异能……没有星力的周正穿越到这个末世。利用游戏中盗贼的角色能力，他将撕毁黑暗迷雾，追逐至高的力量！

altTitles.en: Cage on the Water
Mates Above the Waters

description.ko:
After experiencing multiple diastrophisms, the Earth’s sea level rose exponentially. 
Hoju wants to show his daughter, Han Byoel, the world and heads toward his hometown. There are multiple strange marks in the town he hasn't visited for 20 years… Will the two be able to survive safely?

altTitles.en: MazinSaga

altTitles.ja: マジンサーガ

description.en:
MazinSaga is a manga written and produced by Go Nagai between 1990 and 1998; currently incomplete and up to the sixth volume, it's the summa of Nagai's works, for the complexity of the plot and the treated thematic content.  
Mazinsaga tells the story of the young Koji Kabuto, university student who finds himself having to collect the fruit of the researches of his father, physicist of world-wide reputation who died in mysterious circumstances.  
The boy is thus given a powerful artifact, Mazinger Z, the Armor of God.

title.en: The Strongest Lv1 Support in the World

description.en: “Even if I can only use primary healing skill, I still want to become the strongest!” The LV1 healer boy and the weakest God’s chosen girl started their journey with the goal of becoming the strongest. However, the Young man did not expect that this time would be his last journey.
description.id: “Bahkan jika aku hanya bisa menggunakan teknik penyembuhan dasar, aku ingin menjadi yang terkuat!” Seorang bocah healer level 1 dan gadis pilihan dewa terlemah memulai perjalanan mereka dengan tujuan menjadi yang terkuat.  Namun, pemuda itu tidak menyangka bahwa kali ini akan menjadi perjalanan terakhirnya.

altTitles.en: Maplestory: The Last Adventurer

description.en: The Age of Adventures that started when the Gates opened. The Age of when everything fell apart, filled with desperation, anguish, and misery. And… The Age of when everyone gave up trying to fight back. In that Age, there was only one Explorer who fought to the very end. “You’re the only one left. The Last Explorer, Elpam.” In that moment, the Explorer’s history came to an end, as he returned to the start of the story.

altTitles.en: Delinquent high school girl KuzuHana-chan
Yankee high school girl KuzuHana-chan

altTitles.ja: ヤンキーJKクズハナちゃん

altTitles.pt-br: Garota Delinquente Do Ensino Médio KuzuHana-chan

description.en:
At the beginning of the academic year, Saotome Hodaka enrolls into Moteshiro Prefectural High School, a former all-girls school that had recently integrated, but discovers it has a male to female ratio of 1:359! 

While most might think of this as a paradise, the majority of the students are delinquents and Saotome immediately finds himself being extorted by some of the more aggressive girls. However, he is inadvertently saved by Hanako Kuzuryu, a beautiful delinquent who just wants to be left alone.

Is this the start of a new friendship? And how will Saotome's life unfold in a school full of troublesome women?
description.ja:
男女比率1対359!!　359人の女子高生にいじられまくり!!　つらたんハーレム学園ラブコメ!!　コワかわ最強ヒロイン爆誕!!
四方八方ギャルだらけな県立茂手城高校に入学した黒一点・早乙女穂高は、ヤンキーJK・九頭竜華子にピンチを救われて…!?
description.pt-br:
Uma proporção de homem para mulher de 1:359?!

Saotome-kun é admitido em uma escola cheia de gyarus e conhece uma garota delinqüente chamada Hanako Kuzuryu.

description.ar: لقد مضت ست سنوات منذ بدء اللعبة لتحديد مصير العالم. الملك البطل كانغ يو سونغ، أقوى لاعب لم يهبط من مركز هداف الدوري مرة واحدة، يرحب بالموسم الجديد أيضا. “لقد… انتهيت منذ وقت طويل. إنني أفعل ذلك فقط من أجل المال.” [مستوى التذمر قد أزداد بشكل كبير!] [يعرب شيخ اليقطين عن إرتياحه لتصرفات اللاعب!] ان طريقة النجاة للاعب الموهوب المجنون تتكشف الآن!
description.en:
[By Red-Ice Studios, creators of the series  ‘Solo Leveling and Omniscient Reader’s Viewpoint’]

It’s been six years since the game to decide the fate of the world had started. Hero-King Kang Yoo-Sung, the strongest player who hasn’t dropped from the top ranker’s position once, greets the new season, too.

“I… was finished a long fucking time ago. I’m just doing it for the money.”

[Taunt Level has drastically increased!]

[The Elder of Jesters expresses satisfaction with the actions of the contractor!]

altTitles.en: Ancient Boss of The Abyss

description.en: Baphomet is the ruthless, dispassionate lord of the Abyssal Tower, a mysterious, monster-filled dungeon plaguing the human world. Many Hunters seek to defeat him and bring the tower down to no avail. Despite his demonic power, Baphomet grows curious about humanity. One day, Baphomet is defeated by Raven, the strongest Hunter, and realizes that his true wish is to be just like the humans he previously looked down on. In death, he is granted his wish, as he awakens as a human – without his powers!
description.fr:
Baphomet, le boss de la , attend un chasseur fort capable de se battre à armes égales contre lui.

Lorsqu’il s’est lassé de ces combats répétitifs, il a commencé à s’intéresser au monde de l’humanité grâce aux trophées qu’il avait obtenus des chasseurs morts.

Dans le même temps, il fut de plus en plus fasciné par l’existence des humains lorsque le puissant chasseur dont il avait toujours rêvé apparut devant lui.

Finalement, Baphomet essaie de devenir lui-même un humain…

title.en: Majutsu Gakuin wo Shuseki de Sotsugyoushita Ore ga Boukensha wo Hajimeru no wa sonna ni okashii darouka

altTitles.es: ¿Es extraño haberme vuelto aventurero aún cuando me gradué de la academia de brujería?

altTitles.id: Apa Aneh Kalau Aku Menjadi Petualang Bahkan Jika Aku Lulus dari Institut Sihir?

altTitles.ja: 魔術学院を首席で卒業した俺が冒険者を始めるのはそんなにおかしいだろうか

altTitles.ko: 마술학원을 수석으로 졸업한 내가 모험가를 시작하는 건 이상한 걸까

altTitles.zh-hk: 作為魔術學院首席畢業的我想做冒險者有那麼奇怪嗎

altTitles.zh: 作为魔术学院首席毕业的我想做冒险者有那么奇怪吗

altTitles.ar: هل من الغريب أنني أصبحت مغامرًا حتى لو تخرجت من معهد السحر؟

altTitles.fa: آیا عجیب است که من حتی اگر از مؤسسه جادوگری فارغ التحصیل شوم ، به یک ماجراجو تبدیل شدم؟

altTitles.vi: Có kì lạ không khi tôi trở thành mạo hiểm giả dù tôi tốt nghiệp trường phù thủy?
Trở thành mạo hiểm giả khi là phù thủy hạng nhất buốn cuò thật nhỉ?

altTitles.th: มันแปลกตรงไหน ที่ผมเรียนจบแล้วจะไปเป็น นักพจญภัย

altTitles.fr: Est-ce bizzare que je sois devenu un aventurier alors que je suis diplômé de l’institut de sorcellerie ?

altTitles.en: Is It Odd That I Became an Adventurer Even If I Graduated From the Witchcraft Institute?

altTitles.pt-br: É estranho que eu tenha me tornado um aventureiro mesmo tendo me formado no Instituto de Bruxaria?

description.en:
Having graduated from the prestigious Witchcraft Institute at the top of his class, no job is out of reach for William Glenford. Fame, fortune, prestige are at his feet, but William dreams of only one thing: adventures.  
  
Finding companions in a run-of-the-mill guild with an up-and-coming party of girls including a cleric, a martial artist and a beastman catgirl, and being ranked the lowest at the entry level, they immediately begin noticing that he's **grossly** overqualified for his role and rank… and that this mage may not be a mere "mage", but a full-fledged, national-level wizard.  
  
Will William adjust to his party, or will the girls ever hope to catch up to him?   
Will the girls accept him regardless of his overwhelming superiority, or will he always be the big fish in the small pond?  
  


---
description.es:
Habiéndose graduado de la prestigiosa Academia de Brujería a la cabeza de su grado, no hay ninguna ocupación que esté fuera del alcance de William Glenford. La fama, la fortuna y el prestigio están a sus pies, pero William sueña con una sola cosa: aventuras.  
  
Hallando acompañantes en un gremio común de aventureros, sumándose a un equipo emprendedor de muchachas incluyendo a una clérigo, una artista marcial y una chica gato bestial, y estando en el rango más bajo al nivel de amateur, se empiezan a dar cuenta de que él está apabullantemente sobrecalificado para su rol y rango… y que este mago no es un mero "mago", sino un hechicero de talla nacional.  
  
¿Acaso William se ajustará a su equipo, o acasó las chicas albergarán la esperanza de alcanzar su nivel?  
¿Acaso las chicas le aceptarán sin tapujos acerca de su superioridad anonadante, o será el siempre el pez grande en la laguna pequeña?
description.pt-br:
Tendo se formado no prestigiado Instituto de Bruxaria como o primeiro da turma, nenhum trabalho está fora do alcance de William Glenford.  Fama, fortuna, prestígio estão a seus pés, mas William só sonha com uma coisa: aventuras.

 Encontrando companheiros em uma guilda comum com um grupo de garotas promissoras, incluindo um clérigo, um artista marcial e uma garota-gato homem-fera, e sendo classificado como o mais baixo no nível de entrada, eles imediatamente começam a perceber que ele é  grosseiramente superqualificado para seu papel e posição... e que este mago pode não ser um mero "mago", mas um mago de nível nacional de pleno direito.

 Será que William se adaptará à sua festa ou será que as meninas algum dia terão esperança de alcançá-lo?
 Será que as meninas o aceitarão independentemente de sua esmagadora superioridade, ou ele sempre será o peixe grande no pequeno lago?

title.en: Isekai NTR ~Shinyuu no Onna wo Saikyou Skill de Otosu Houhou~

altTitles.ja: 異世界NTR～親友のオンナを最強スキルで堕とす方法～

altTitles.th: ISEKAI NTR ~สร้างฮาเร็มโดยไม่ให้พรรคพวกรู้~

altTitles.ko: 이세계 NTR ~절친의 여자를 최강 스킬로 함락시키는 방법~

altTitles.zh-hk: 異世界NTR ～不被同伴發現地開後宮～
異世界NTR～用最強技能令摯友的女人墜落的方法～

altTitles.en: Isekai NTR: Sullying My Best Friend's Women With the Strongest Skill
NTR in Another World: Sullying My Best Friend's Women With the Strongest Skill

description.en:
This shitty world that's nothing but a trashy game, he and I will definitely escape it together. So, all these annoying women trying to take advantage of him are just a nuisance. What's worse, it seems like he's beginning to have some feelings for them.

That's why, for his sake, I'll eat them up first. But, just what is this power…?
description.es: Este mundo de mierda que no es más que un juego basura, él y yo definitivamente escaparemos juntos. Entonces, todas estas mujeres molestas que intentan aprovecharse de él son solo una molestia. Lo que es peor, él parece que está comenzando a sentir algo por ellas. Por eso, por su bien, las comeré primero. Pero, ¿qué es este poder…?

description.en:
I don’t want to work. I really don’t want to work. But I have no choice.
Problems with Humans, Elves, Orcs, Trolls, Dragons and such alien immigrants never seem to cease.
800 years of disgusted employment. The struggles of a man who will die if he stops working.
